keyMoments.title: Marines Battle Luffy's Forces
keyMoments.description: Marine forces engage Luffy, Jinbe, Ivankov, and the Newkama army in the plaza.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the Marines' defensive efforts to prevent Luffy from reaching Ace.

description: The World Government's military sea force, tasked with enforcing the law and fighting piracy across the seas.
headquarters: Marineford (at the time of this episode)

keyMoments.title: Whitebeard Orders Strategic Strike
keyMoments.description: Whitebeard commands forces to sink surrounding Marine ships.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Whitebeard's tactical leadership during the war.

keyMoments.title: Alliance with Buggy's Forces
keyMoments.description: Whitebeard forms temporary alliance with Buggy and the Impel Down prisoners.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Whitebeard's pragmatic approach to gaining allies during the war.

description: One of the Four Emperor crews, led by Edward 'Whitebeard' Newgate. Fighting to rescue their 2nd Division Commander, Portgas D. Ace.

keyMoments.title: Ivankov Confronts Lost Comrade
keyMoments.description: Revolutionary Commander Ivankov discovers that fellow Revolutionary Kuma has lost his humanity.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the personal cost of Kuma's sacrifice for the Revolutionary Army.

description: An organization seeking to overthrow the World Government, led by Monkey D. Dragon.

keyMoments.title: Hancock Defies Warlord Duties
keyMoments.description: Hancock attacks Marine officer Smoker to protect Luffy, openly defying her Warlord obligations.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Hancock choosing Luffy over her duty to the World Government.

description: A group of seven powerful pirates allied with the World Government in exchange for legal immunity.

keyMoments.title: Newkama Army Fights at Marineford
keyMoments.description: The Newkama army fights alongside Luffy and Ivankov against Marine forces.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the Newkama's commitment to helping Luffy save Ace.

description: The followers and soldiers of Emporio Ivankov, practicing the Newkama Kenpo martial art style. Part of the Revolutionary Army's G Army.
